programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep1213
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep909
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep809810
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep659
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3361
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45634564
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep973974
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1791
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Monday (M) Ep384
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return…

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a terrorist group plots to obtain nuclear materials under the cover of a violent coup in Northern Africa, only the Chinese Navy’s elite, Jiaolong Assault Team, have the deadly skill and precision needed to take on the situation and rescue its citizens.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kong’s greatest filmmakers. It traces Hui’s life story and her 40-year career’s ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boy’s dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wang’s which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: A hijacking of a police van occurs when the Police Commissioner is away from Hong Kong. Deputy Commissioner Lee leads a rescue operation code-named Cold War. Fellow Deputy Commissioner Sean moves to take control from Lee as he thinks Lee is emotionally affected by his son being held hostage, but the efforts end up threatening both their reputation.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the “midnight gymnasium” programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Zhongkui Kill Demon Legend
programme.desc: The Heavenly Master trapped the spirit of the Demon King so as to save the world from evil. Before he dies, the trapped spirit is transferred into Zhong Kui. As a half human and half demon, Zhong Kui is torn between good and evil. Which side will he finally choose?

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: A high school student gets pregnant and is forced to have an abortion. When she dies from the operation, she returns as a ghost to haunt the apartment complex that she used to live

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, a young, talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman Duo La in Yalazhen. After that he begins his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind this mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La and ends up uncovering a mystery far beyond his comprehension…

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the “midnight gymnasium” programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughter’s diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: The Grandmaster of Kungfu
programme.desc: The Eight-Nation Alliance dare not invade Tianjin as it is the homeland of martial arts. To conquer the city, Japan sends its top martial arts master to open a new academy challenging all Chinese masters. Huo Yuan Jia rises to fight, leading the other masters to resist the Japanese and defend the country.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a “movie time machine” and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn – can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers’ claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Legend Of The Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu’s beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: Woman Of The Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: Rape Of The Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu-lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun-yang.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father’s deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. When the two meet, they are entangled in the underworld of boxing gambling.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - “Twelve Deadly Coins” and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu’s until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Ying’s father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt “Shaolin Hand Lock” from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Ling’s house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiao’s fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - “Black Leopard”. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of “Black Leopard”, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister’s wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This colourful, complex saga is packed with conspiracies, schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres on the struggle for underworld supremacy between the Longmen and Roc clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut or obvious.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clan’s disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score “The Proud One”. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clan’s leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family’s young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo’s stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: Stalin
programme.desc: Tamil Actionl political drama, Starring - Chiranjeevi & Trisha

programme.desc: Tamil crime thriller movie starring Vaibhav, Venkat Prabhu, Vani Bhojan, and Poorna

programme.desc: After getting robbed, Reza loses his job delivering gold from workshops to jewellery stores. Together with his friend, Reza devises a plan to get back on his feet by finding a legendary diamond at the bottom of an enormous septic tank.

programme.title: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Stranded in a hotel on a storm-swept island, Katrin has a fun-filled flirt with Peter, the only other guest. The next day, Katrin is relieved to return home to her loving marriage. Until Peter appears at her friend’s wedding - with his wife.

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 2
programme.desc: After getting bitten by a snake and waking up in a remote village in Vietnam, Paula sets off on her quest to find her twin sister and the doctor who had treated her. However, she soon learns of her sister’s dark secret.

programme.title: Thirst
programme.desc: On a hilltop in Bulgaria plagued by drought, a couple and their teenage son eke out a living doing laundry for local hotels. The arrival of a well-digger and his daughter promises not only to quench their thirst for water, but for something far stronger.

programme.title: Identifying Features
programme.desc: Magdalena, a mother in search of her missing son, meets Miguel, recently deported from the US and looking for his mother. Together, they make their way through the desolate and unforgiving militia-ridden landscapes south of the border.

programme.title: Murders in Lille
programme.desc: A sculptor is found dead inside one of his own sculptures on exhibition. Detective Caroline works with a childhood friend, who is also the exhibition’s designer, to crack the case. But little does she know, the suspect is closer than she’ll ever imagine.

programme.title: Cherating Syndrome
programme.desc: After a confusing breakup, Alisha decides to go on a trip to Cherating to figure out whether her relationship is worth fighting for. There, she meets a local stranger who offers her a tour around Cherating which changes her perspective on life.

programme.title: Real Guys
programme.desc: After a failed modelling stint, Jonas returns home penniless and to a son who doesn’t recognise him. When he’s offered the job to be a stripper, the fast cash attracts him. But how will he hide this embarrassing secret from his son and new love interest?

programme.title: Wars
programme.desc: Following in her father’s footsteps, and yearning to fill the existential emptiness within her, 20-year-old Emma decides to join the army. In an environment of harsh discipline and repressive rules, Emma unexpectedly falls in love with her superior.

programme.title: Rust
programme.desc: After connecting with each other on social media, Tati and Renet’s budding relationship is cut short when Tati’s intimate video is leaked online. While Renet has to deal with problems with his parents, Tati is struggling to keep her life from crumbling.

programme.title: I'm Losing It
programme.desc: When her fitness-obsessed boyfriend dumps her for a skinny girl, shy and chubby Anna resolves to slim down and win him back. But, with help from her plump health-nut buddy Nick, Anna discovers that true happiness is more than six-pack abs.

programme.title: Silenced Tree
programme.desc: Hayati is a small-town literature teacher and author who can’t move on from his past: his failing marriage, his sick mother, a decaying walnut tree, and memories of his father. When his wife’s body is found, the innocent Hayati confesses to the murder.

programme.title: The Girl With Nine Wigs
programme.desc: Sophie has just started her studies, but her life is turned upside down when she is diagnosed with cancer. However, her lust for life drives her to break free from her illness, and she does so with nine wigs, each bringing out an aspect of herself.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 4
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Sal and Murr play a game of "Put-Pocket" at a grocery store, then get jumpy at the park after taking over each other's cell phones. And tonight's big loser learns that when you gotta go…you gotta go.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 2
programme.desc: When Sheldon learns that Penny is thinking about breaking up with Leonard, he tries to intervene. Meanwhile, Howard is being picked on in space by the other astronauts.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 3
programme.desc: While the pressures of being in space starts to take its toll on Howard, Amy feels threatened when Sheldon hires a young female assistant, Alex (guest star MARGO HARSHMAN).

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 4
programme.desc: When Howard returns from space, he doesn’t get the hero’s welcome he expected. Meanwhile, Game Night turns into a battle of the sexes.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 5
programme.desc: The gang celebrates Halloween at Stuart’s comic book store. Meanwhile Leonard and Penny discover a new spark in their relationship when he seduces her with science.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 6
programme.desc: Sheldon’s tenuous relationship with renowned scientist STEPHEN HAWKING is threatened by a game of “Words with Friends,” while Penny secretly enrolls in a class at the local college.

programme.title: Stargirl S3 1
programme.desc: Courtney is hopeful for peace in Blue Valley but when The Gambler arrives to town the team find themselves at odds over whether he can be trusted.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 6
programme.desc: Cash flies over a locker that reveals a high-ticket mystery item. Then, everyone digs deep to win an ATM, but when the dust settles will this thing be filled with big bucks or major regret? And later, the unlikeliest of duos team up with a strategy that leaves our buyers' heads spinning.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 7
programme.desc: In Vegas, an old rivalry resurfaces. Then, a locker reveals a covered item that's thought to be a vintage car, but when the bidding ends will the buyer drive away with a fortune or stall out in failure? And later, it's every man for himself when a unit full of gemstones ignites an all out war among the competition.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 8
programme.desc: A mega-find leaves the winning bidder scratching his head, but when the true nature of this item is revealed he'll be swimming in more than just cash. Then, the gloves come off when T-Money scrambles to scoop up a locker filled with vintage bar equipment. And later, Scott spots something he hopes no one else sees. If his secret stays safe, he could quadruple his profit.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 9
programme.desc: Mystery is the name of the game as Brandon and Lori uncover a vintage machine filled with risqu� photos. It's tantalizing, but is it profitable? Then, our buyers lock horns in a bidding war over what could be priceless artwork. And it's every man forhimself when Jesse makes a blind bid that sparks a frenzy, all over an unopened locker.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 10

programme.desc: When a Gothamite is found beaten to death, Gordon and Bullock are intrigued by the motive and take on the case. Meanwhile, Bruce returns to school and has trouble making friends.

programme.title: The Flash S9 4
programme.desc: With the power out in the city, Team Flash calls upon the Rogue Squad to help as Iris is visited by an old friend. Joe and Cecile work on finding a balance.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In the future, North America is no more. In its place has risen Panem, a divided nation split into 12 districts. Every year, each district selects a teen of each gender (called "Tributes") to test their worth in a competition known as the Hunger Games. Part entertainment, part brutal retribution for a past rebellion, the televised games are broadcast throughout Panem. The 24 participants are forced to eliminate their competitors while the citizens of Panem are required to watch. When her younger sister is selected as District 12's latest "Tribute," Katniss volunteers to take her place, and trains under hard-drinking former Hunger Games champion Haymitch Abernathy to sharpen her killer instincts. Now in order to survive the game and emerge the victor, this young combatant must put all of her skills to the ultimate test.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 6
programme.desc: While Fiona and Thony’s relationship is strained due to Thony’s lies, Arman uses Thony’s relationship with Garrett to feed information to the FBI.

programme.desc: When Barry suddenly gains the power of speed thinking, he attempts to use his new gift to save Iris. But Cisco is hesitant to trust it. Meanwhile, Eva faces a shattering truth.

programme.desc: Shark vs Barracuda - In central Africa, Cyril must remain on high alert, especially from his small tippy dugout. programme.title: Spectacular Earth (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Volcano - Volcan del Fuego in Guatemala is one of the most 'explosive' volcanoes of them all. Witness the daring attempt to lower a data gathering probe right into the crater of a volcano just before it erupts.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Aurora - The largest of all of Earth's displays stretches across thousands of kilometres in the night sky: the Aurora Borealis. The arctic wilderness of Northern Sweden is one of the best places to witness the aurora. Discover how it is created, by witnessing the beauty of total eclipses, a mass turtle migration in Costa Rica and powerful tidal whirlpools off the west coast of Scotland.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Simon travels through Brazil, from the heart of the Amazon rainforest to the coast and the glamorous-but-troubled city of Rio de Janeiro.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep4
programme.desc: Shadow Dwellers - With winter tightening its grip, Alaskans buckle down and ready themselves for the long months ahead.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: Greenland - Robson Green is in Greenland, where he catches redfish and is shown how to cook it by his fishing opponent.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary’s orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla’s fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Anna’s clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Anna’s scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Family’s matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies’ leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Queen of the Bay Ep6
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies’ lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies’ first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a park’s main attraction.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Highlands Ep7
programme.desc: Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting – but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary’s orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla’s fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - The Kalahari Ep5
programme.desc: An immense, dry land dominates southwestern Africa. Here, sand covers the land in rippling dunes and rain drains away as quickly as it falls. Kalahari, meaning "place of great thirst," is an appropriate name for one of southern Africa’s greatest wildernesses.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Anna’s clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Anna’s scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Family’s matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies’ leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Queen of the Bay Ep6
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies’ lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies’ first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a park’s main attraction.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 - When the Rain Comes Ep1
programme.desc: The Arabian landscape is a virtually waterless desert where rain scarcely falls and animals endure blistering temperatures. But for 3 months every year, a remote region on the south west coast undergoes an astonishing transformation… into a lush, verdant oasis.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Wetlands Ep8
programme.desc: Wild Wild East’s wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blanding’s Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blanding’s can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary’s orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla’s fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Anna’s clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Anna’s scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Family’s matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies’ leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Queen of the Bay Ep6
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies’ lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies’ first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a park’s main attraction.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Crustaceans Ep9
programme.desc: The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Horses of St. Pierre & Miquelon Ep10
programme.desc: In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies. Wild Wild East infiltrates the herd to explore the politics and power of horses. Meanwhile, in the waters surrounding the French archipelago, the once-vast stocks of cod fish are disappearing, changing life above the surface for humans and horses.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Elephant Valley Ep1
programme.desc: Follow a family of elephants from sunrise to sunset as they are joined by a cast of characters in a valley that is bursting with life. But in the dry season temperatures soar and drought grips the land.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Wild Heaveyweights Ep2
programme.desc: In Zambia’s Luangwa Valley some of the largest animals on Earth live side by side. Discover how each of these giants uses ingenious strategies and amazing adaptations, honed over millions of years, to survive-and thrive.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Life and Death on the Plains Ep3
programme.desc: Liuwa Plains is a remote grassland and one of Africa’s last wild places. Only the toughest of Africa’s wildlife can survive here. Witness an extraordinary story of perseverance, adaptation, and survival in this extreme habitat.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Hippo River Ep4
programme.desc: The Luangwa River is a lifeline for animals-and home to the world’s largest concentration of hippos. See how these hippos spend their days dealing with heat, insects, and threats from their fellow river-dwellers.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Social Ep3
programme.desc: Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies’ unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scrappy Ep4
programme.desc: Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias’ stink bombs; honey badgers’ savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls’ razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Pointy Bits Ep5
programme.desc: Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scroungers/Scavengers Ep6
programme.desc: Go scavenging with nature’s cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars’ fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas’ bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Colors & Patterns Ep7
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to nature’s most spectacular fashion show. Admire the luxuriant blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, stunning pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet, and the meaningful markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - The Big Ones Ep8
programme.desc: Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megashark’s stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Chasing Mako Ep3
programme.desc: In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours, challenge myths about sharks, and fight for the protection of these supreme predators – before it’s too late.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - How Smart Are Sharks? Ep4
programme.desc: Often portrayed as mindless eating machines prone to attacking humans, sharks are more complex and intelligent than previously thought. Find out how these graceful top predators interact, choose friends, and even teach other sharks.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 - In Cold Blood Ep2
programme.desc: It sometimes feels like mammals rule the world; there are well over 5,000 species, colonising every corner of the globe. But in Arabia there’s a different story – this is a land where reptiles rule.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Invasion Ep11
programme.desc: Non-native species have made their way into the Wild Wild East and staked their claim to the jagged coast. At White Point Beach Resort in Liverpool, Nova Scotia bunnies have hopped on in for an extended holiday. It’s turf wars between the beachcombers and the chalets dwellers. Meanwhile, the starling population is beginning to rival gulls and pigeons.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Seasons Ep12
programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels through time and space to show what one-year — and four seasons — looks like for the wildest animals of Canada’s East-Coast.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Wanderers of the Lost Forest Ep3
programme.desc: This story takes place in the town of Hogsback, a tiny village on the top of a mountain in the Eastern Cape of South Africa. Due to habitat loss and fragmentation, the Samango monkeys and Cape Parrots of the nearby forests have been forced to search for food outside of their natural habitats and venture into the town on a daily basis.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Alhambra Ep4
programme.desc: Tour the marvelous Alhambra, a must-see fortress in Spain's Grenada region. Today this world heritage site acts as a refuge for the region’s wildlife. With its many streams and fountains, Alhambra serves amphibian, fish, and bird alike.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africa’s Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - Mvula's Journey Ep4
programme.desc: Mvula is the youngest calf in the Madzi family. Temperatures are soaring. Lagoons and waterholes are drying up. This forces Mvula and his family to undertake a long and dangerous journey to the only remaining source of water: the Luangwa River.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Future Food Stars (S1) Ep7

programme.desc: Jamie kicks off his new one-pan series with a simplified and delicious frying-pan pasta, a clever twist on a fish pie that's full of flavour with none of the fuss, and a sublime roast lamb feast with a fantastic hack to speed up cooking.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders (S1) Ep2

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep33
programme.desc: Close Encounters Of The Mort Kind - When Mort is abducted by "aliens", King Julien teams with Clover, Maurice and Hector to investigate why he's not the one being abducted.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep34
programme.desc: The Butterfly War - King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdom's spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.

programme.desc: My Pharoah Lady - Cleo poses as Pharaoh Yosira to convince other galactic leaders to join the fight against Octavian, while also uncovering which one of them is planning to kill Yosira.

programme.desc: Double - While Cleo and the gang try to find Octavians’s spy, a robot impersonates various people form the Academy.

programme.desc: Lucky And The Doubtful Drought - When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.desc: Zero Dunk Thunky / Pie Vs Pie - Thunk is captured by the Broods and develops feelings for Blurg /At the Valley's food competition, Thunk and Ugga mistakenly make a new hit food

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep37
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pocket'S Present - Fuse asks Noddy to take a present to the Pockets. But when Noddy arrives at the Treehouse, he discovers he's carrying an empty box. The present, whatever it was, has gone! Noddy must investigate: where is the Pockets' present? But how will he ever find it when he doesn't actually know what it is? It's going to take all his detecting skills to solve this one!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep38
programme.desc: The Case Of Fuse'S New Game - When Fuse invites his friends to come for a playdate all they want to do is play his new computer game. But then suddenly the computer goes off. He soon discovers there's a power cut affecting the whole of Brickabuild. But who switched off the power? And why? Desperate to carry on with the game, Noddy decides to investigate: how can they play Fuse's new game?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep39
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pirate'S Treasure (Ex : The Case Of The Queen'S Dance) - Queen Sparklewings asks the Pirate Captain to do the first dance with her at the Queen's Dance. But when it's time to practise, the Captain can't come: someone's stolen their treasure! Noddy decides to help find the treasure so the Captain will still be able to dance. He needs to investigate: Who stole the Pirates' treasure?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep40
programme.desc: The Case Of The Empty Store - Clockwork Mouse leaves Carlton in charge of getting everything ready for the Builders' Parade. Carlton gratefully accepts Noddy's offer of help but doesn't want the Naughticorns helping too! But when Carlton goes to the Brickabuild Store for supplies, he's horrified to discover the store is empty. How will they get the parade ready now? And will Clockwork Mouse ever trust Carlton again? Noddy sets out to investigate: Who took all the stuff from the Brickabuild Store?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep13
programme.desc: Rumble In The Jungle - Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise… he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep14
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Favourite Noise - Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep37
programme.desc: High-Tech Overload - Big Chris has got a new gadget to monitor the cars. He puts it to the test, what could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep38
programme.desc: Workshop Chaos - Big Chris is furious when Marsha tidies up his workshop - how's he supposed to work in these conditions? Luckily Flash saves helps out by messing it up again!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep39
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Shapes Up - Conrod is having an engine tune up at Silver Hatch. He boasts that his spoilers make him faster than all the other cars… who then want to be just as fast as their V8 hero…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep40
programme.desc: Pit Stop Perils - Mr Carburettor is fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest car at Silver Hatch. He decrees that the pair will have a race, and whoever wins, is the fastest - no more arguing!

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep19
programme.desc: Ring My Bell / First Mate Casper - Ring My Bell When Casper encourages Quasi to go on strike from his thankless job as chore boy, Alder and Dash make Casper take his place. First Mate Casper When Cappy needs a first mate, Casper's the only one who's up to the challenge.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep20
programme.desc: Power Outage Part 1 + 2 - Power Outage – Part 1: A Powerful Foe When Scare School falls victim to the Baccora, Kibosh encourages the students to work together, setting booby-traps and building defences. Power Outage – Part 2: Razznik's Revenge Creature by creature, the evil entity, Baccora, robs Scare School of its powers and locks them into a magical cleptor.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep18
programme.desc: Over Shadowed / Beware The Chickipede - White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep18
programme.desc: Gluphosaurus - When D-Structs tricks the Gluphosaurs into attacking the Dinotrux, Revvit must befriend them and find a way to “unstick” the crew from one another.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep18
programme.desc: Mini Mayhem In Moscow - Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep6
programme.desc: Bug Zapper/The Helper - When Mr. Ladybug finds the new bug zapper the Humans installed to be irresistible, the Mighty Ones try creating distractions to keep him from zapping himself. / When Rabbit realizes Rocksy is great at "conflict management," he tricks her into helping him strongarm other yard denizens in order to get what he wants.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep18
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him … and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep18
programme.desc: Daddy Julien - King Julien believes Mort is the son he never knew he had – despite the fact that Mort is two years older than him.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep19
programme.desc: There Will Be Eggs/I Think We'Re Alone Meow - Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep18
programme.desc: Waltor / Out Foxed - When Tip is too busy to hang, Oh steals and befriends a squid from the city aquarium; The B. O. Boys attempt to tear Tip and Oh apart.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where'S My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep9
programme.desc: Out Of The Cave And Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep10
programme.desc: Return Of The Four Constellations - The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales Of Arcadia Ep18
programme.desc: The Shattered King - While Jim and Toby search for dates to the Spring Dance the team searches for the Second Triumbric Stone in the marshlands of the Quagawumps.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep6
programme.desc: Bug Zapper/The Helper - When Mr. Ladybug finds the new bug zapper the Humans installed to be irresistible, the Mighty Ones try creating distractions to keep him from zapping himself. / When Rabbit realizes Rocksy is great at "conflict management," he tricks her into helping him strongarm other yard denizens in order to get what he wants.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep35
programme.desc: Fast Food Lemur Nation - Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces “fast food” to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep36
programme.desc: Get Off My Lawn - When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep13
programme.desc: Rescue - Cleo and the rest go on a rescue mission to crime-ridden Hykosis City, which leads to a devastating confrontation with Octavian.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep14
programme.desc: Mihos - Cleo encounters an adorable alien creature and brings him home, along with his eggs. Wait, if he’s a “him,” how does he have eggs? Aliens are weird.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep35
programme.desc: Lucky And The Arabian Nightmares - When Al goes out of town, he puts the PALs in charge of the ramada, but they get more than they bargained for when three trouble-making horses escape

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep36
programme.desc: Lucky And The Fearless Fillies - When the PALs and Snips get caught in a sandstorm, the girls must keep Snips calm and safe

programme.desc: Super Smash Siblings / A Hole In Grug - Eep and Thunk compete against their classmates in “Ahhh-Smashin”/After being denied a spot on the Valley's Wall of Fame, Grug creates a new game

programme.desc: Bait With Destiny / Sappy Together - Eep gets jealous when Thunk is invited to join the hunters/Grug and Gran must work together after getting stuck to each other with sticky tree sap

programme.desc: Bait With Destiny / Sappy Together - Eep gets jealous when Thunk is invited to join the hunters/Grug and Gran must work together after getting stuck to each other with sticky tree sap

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep41
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Players - It's time for the Toyland football match but the game can't go ahead until Noddy finds the missing players. Noddy discovers that someone misdirected Pat Pat and Deltoid so that they'd miss the match. Noddy finds the missing players and reunites everyone at the real football pitch but then Hoof disappears. Noddy discovers that Hoof misdirected the others because he wanted to be the best player. Hoof learns that football is a team sport where all the team members need to work together to make it the best game ever. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep42
programme.desc: The Case Of The Changed Basketball Hoop - Noddy's about to play a game of basketball with Big Ears and Deltoid when he realizes that the hoop has been fiddled with. Who could've done that and why? Noddy's investigation leads him to Fuse, who explains that he just wanted to help the toys that weren't as skilled as him. Everyone practises and realises that the best way to improve at sport is to keep practising. Well done Noddy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep43
programme.desc: The Case Of The Ruined Crops - Farmer Tom is confused and upset when he finds all his trees and corn knocked over. Noddy decides to investigate: who spoiled Farmer Tom's crops? He soon discovers lots of strange heavy bags scattered all over the farm. Whose are they? Where did they come from? And what could they possibly have to do with Smartysaurus's new hot air balloon?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep44
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Pulley - The Head Builder isn't happy. Someone's been playing with the builders' stuff and now their pulley doesn't work. Noddy decides he needs to find out who did it before anything else goes wrong. Who broke the Builders' pulley?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep15
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo Slips Up - Raa Raa and the other animals keep slipping up on banana skins that are littering the jungle floor. Where could they have come from? Together the animals clear up the mess and discover who has been littering the jungle with banana skins.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep16
programme.desc: No Sleep Til Bedtime - It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub…

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep17
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Rainy Day - It is raining in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is annoyed as he doesn't think he'll be able to play with his friends… until they discover that the rain makes lots of exciting new noises.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep18
programme.desc: Two'S Company - Raa Raa and Crocky inadvertently leave one of the others out of all their games. Will they realise that sometimes games can be more fun the more players you have?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep41
programme.desc: Roary'S Demolition Derby - Roary is in a mischievous mood and keeps crashing into things. Big Chris has a great idea how Roary can burn up all his energy and be helpful at the same time!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure - Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection - Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater / Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost - Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Race for the Golden Treasure - Blaze and Pegwheel the Pirate have teamed up for the ultimate treasure hunt! Together they must find three keys to unlock a special chest. But Crusher's sailing the high seas too, and he'll do anything to get the treasure first!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Need for Blazing Speed - When Crusher tries to get Blazing Speed for himself, he accidentally sends Blaze's engine flying! Now it's Blaze vs. Crusher in a race for Blazing Speed-but without an engine, Blaze must find new ways to propel himself to victory.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy / Caracol Cove - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Slobber Slug - A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep402
programme.desc: The Glitter Games! - Learn all about manners with the Guppies, as Molly helps aspiring princess Demanda get polite in time for the Glitter Games! Will they become true princesses together?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Costume Boxing! - At the height of Fashion Week in Bubbletucky, Molly performs in the quick-change dress-up match. Her skills land her on the cover of Dress-Up!, the hottest fashion mag in town!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Party Time - Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Barbamartians - While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hoedown / Pups Save Alex - It’s Adventure Bay Western Days, when a herd of cows escape from a train at the railway station! // When their friend Alex decides he wants to be a member of the PAW Patrol the PUPS and Ryder let him come along for the ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights - Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // It’s Chase’s birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Double Trouble / Box Not So Clever - In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: We're toast - The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep613

programme.desc: Shark Prank - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark.
